nodes.title: PingPong Custom YAML
widgets_values:
step_random_mode: block
step_size: 5
first_ancestral_step: 14
last_ancestral_step: 34
enable_clamp_output: false
start_sigma_index: 0
end_sigma_index: -1
blend_mode: lerp
step_blend_mode: lerp
fbg_config:
  sampler_mode: EULER
  cfg_scale: 12
  cfg_start_sigma: 1.0
  cfg_end_sigma: 0.004
  fbg_start_sigma: 1.0
  fbg_end_sigma: 0.004
  fbg_guidance_multiplier: 1.0
  ancestral_start_sigma: 1.0
  ancestral_end_sigma: 0.004
  max_guidance_scale: 22.0
  max_posterior_scale: 4.5
  initial_value: 0.0
  initial_guidance_scale: 1.0
  guidance_max_change: 1.0
  temp: 0.0
  offset: 0.0
  pi: 0.25
  t_0: 0.5
  t_1: 0.4
fbg_eta: 0.00
fbg_s_noise: 1.0
debug_mode: true

nodes.title: Sampler YAML
widgets_values:
# ------------------------------------------------------------------
# ACE-STEP AUDIO CONFIGURATION (v1.5.0)
# Compatible with: PingPongSamplerNodeFBG v1.5.0
# Tuned for: High-Dynamic Range Audio Generation
# ------------------------------------------------------------------

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- Main Sampler Settings ---
# Audio benefits from "block" randomization to maintain rhythmic consistency
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
step_random_mode: "block"  
step_size: 25
seed: 80085  # Base seed for reproducibility

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- Ancestral Settings ---
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
first_ancestral_step: 0
last_ancestral_step: -1
ancestral_noise_type: "gaussian"

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- Scheduling & Clamping ---
# Audio latents often exceed -1.0/1.0; clamping is usually disabled for audio
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
start_sigma_index: 0
end_sigma_index: -1
enable_clamp_output: false 

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- Blending ---
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
blend_mode: "lerp"
step_blend_mode: "cosine"  # Cosine helps smooth transitions between high-energy steps

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- Conditional Blending ---
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
conditional_blend_mode: false
conditional_blend_sigma_threshold: 0.3
conditional_blend_function_name: "lerp"
conditional_blend_on_change: false
conditional_blend_change_threshold: 0.2

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- Noise Control ---
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
clamp_noise_norm: false  # Keep FALSE for audio dynamic range
max_noise_norm: 1.5
adaptive_noise_scaling: false
noise_scale_factor: 1.0
progressive_blend_mode: false  # Audio structure is consistent; progressive blend might warp pitch

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- Res 2 Restarts (NEW in v1.5.0) ---
# Experimental for Audio: Can help fix "glitches" or phase issues.
# 
# RECOMMENDATION FOR AUDIO:
#   1. First render: enable_restarts=false (establish baseline)
#   2. If you hear artifacts: Try restart_mode="conservative"
#   3. For heavy correction: Use restart_mode="aggressive"
#
# AUDIO-SPECIFIC NOTES:
#   - Restarts may affect temporal coherence (rhythm drift)
#   - Works best for fixing glitches, not for creative effect
#   - Conservative mode is safest for music
#   - Aggressive mode better for sound effects/foley
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
enable_restarts: false  # Set to TRUE after baseline render
restart_mode: "conservative"  # Gentle mode for audio (switch to "aggressive" if needed)
restart_noise_scale: 0.35  # 35% jump-back (safe for audio temporal coherence)
restart_s_noise: 1.0  # Standard noise magnitude (NOT 0.10!)
restart_steps: ""  # Auto-generate (or specify: "20,40,60,80" for manual control)

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- Debugging ---
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
debug_mode: 2  # Detailed logging (0=off, 1=basic, 2=detailed)
enable_profiling: true
tensor_memory_optimization: false

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- FBG Config (Ace-Step Specifics) ---
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
sigma_range_preset: "Custom"  # Force manual ranges
fbg_sampler_mode: "PINGPONG"  # PINGPONG logic is REQUIRED for Ace-Step

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Static & Dynamic Guidance
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
cfg_scale: 6.0  # High base CFG is standard for Ace-Step
cfg_start_sigma: 1.0
cfg_end_sigma: 0.004
fbg_start_sigma: 1.0
fbg_end_sigma: 0.004

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Guidance Scaling & Limits (High Values for Audio)
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
max_guidance_scale: 5000.0  # Massive scale allowed for audio peaks
initial_guidance_scale: 3.0
fbg_guidance_multiplier: 550.0  # Aggressive FBG multiplier
guidance_max_change: 1000.0  # Allow rapid guidance shifts (transients)

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# FBG Core Parameters
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
pi: 0.35  # Lower PI = more aggressive guidance adaptation
t_0: 0.7  # Late offset
t_1: 0.4  # Early temp scaling
fbg_temp: 0.0
fbg_offset: 0.0

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# State Management
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
max_posterior_scale: 3.0
log_posterior_initial_value: 0.0
log_posterior_ema_factor: 0.8  # High smoothing to prevent popping/clicking

nodes.title: APG YAML
widgets_values:
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# APG AUDIO DIFFUSION CONFIG - Granular Glide Path
# CORRECTED FOR APG GUIDER v1.4.2 (Chronological Order)
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

verbose: true # Show detailed rule matching in console

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# RULES
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# The code sorts rules by start_sigma (ascending).
# It picks the FIRST rule where: current_sigma <= start_sigma
# This file is written in chronological order (Phase 0 -> 6).
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

rules:
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  # PHASE 0: BOOTSTRAP - Max Noise (All σ > 0.9)
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  # (FIXED) Using start_sigma: -1 makes this the fallback rule
  # for all sigmas higher than 0.9 (i.e., the start of generation).
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  - start_sigma: -1            # Catches all sigmas > 0.9
    apg_scale: 0.0           # APG is OFF
    cfg: 12.0            # Strong CFG for initial direction
    predict_image: true

  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  # PHASE 1: EARLY STRUCTURE - Very High Noise (σ ≤ 0.9)
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  - start_sigma: 1.0
    apg_scale: 5.0         # Strongest APG application
    cfg: 10.0            # CFG begins its descent
    predict_image: true    # Guide the denoised output
    # --- (FIXED) 'mode: pure_apg' replaced with correct keys ---
    pre_cfg_mode: false
    update_mode: "DEFAULT"
    update_blend_mode: lerp    # Smooth momentum blending
    dims: [-1]             # Normalize over frequency dimension
    momentum: 0.6          # Positive momentum for stability
    norm_threshold: 2.5    # Prevent extreme corrections

  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  # PHASE 2: MAIN GUIDANCE - High Noise (σ ≤ 0.6)
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  - start_sigma: 0.6
    apg_scale: 4.0         # Tapering APG strength
    cfg: 8.0             # Tapering CFG strength
    # --- (FIXED) Settings must be explicitly defined in each rule ---
    predict_image: true
    pre_cfg_mode: false
    update_mode: "DEFAULT"
    update_blend_mode: lerp
    dims: [-1]
    momentum: 0.6
    norm_threshold: 2.5

  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  # PHASE 3: MID-RANGE REFINEMENT - Medium Noise (σ ≤ 0.4)
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  - start_sigma: 0.4
    apg_scale: 2.5         # APG is now half its initial strength
    cfg: 7.0             # CFG continues to soften
    # --- (FIXED) Settings must be explicitly defined in each rule ---
    predict_image: true
    pre_cfg_mode: false
    update_mode: "DEFAULT"
    update_blend_mode: lerp
    dims: [-1]
    momentum: 0.6
    norm_threshold: 2.5

  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  # PHASE 4: LATE DETAIL - Low-Medium Noise (σ ≤ 0.25)
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  - start_sigma: 0.25
    apg_scale: 1.5         # Gentle guidance for details
    cfg: 6.0             # Lower CFG
    # --- (FIXED) Settings must be explicitly defined in each rule ---
    predict_image: true
    pre_cfg_mode: false
    update_mode: "DEFAULT"
    update_blend_mode: lerp
    dims: [-1]
    momentum: 0.6
    norm_threshold: 2.5

  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  # PHASE 5: FINE-TUNING - Low Noise (σ ≤ 0.1)
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  - start_sigma: 0.1
    apg_scale: 0.75        # APG is barely active
    cfg: 5.0
    # --- (FIXED) Settings must be explicitly defined in each rule ---
    predict_image: true
    pre_cfg_mode: false
    update_mode: "DEFAULT"
    update_blend_mode: lerp
    dims: [-1]
    momentum: 0.6
    norm_threshold: 2.5

  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  # PHASE 6: FINAL POLISH - Very Low Noise (σ ≤ 0.05)
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  - start_sigma: 0.05
    apg_scale: 0.0         # APG is fully OFF
    cfg: 4.0             # Very low CFG for a clean, natural finish
    predict_image: true    # (Copied) Must be defined in every rule

[Verse 1]
Lost in your eyes, I see a stranger's gaze
A love that's faded like a worn-out craze
You whisper sweet nothings, but it's just a phase
I'm left with nothing but the echoes of our days

[Chorus]
Tossed aside like a broken toy
Valued less than yesterday's joy
In your arms is where I used to be
But now you're gone and I'm lost at sea

[Verse 2]
Midnight shadows dance upon your wall
Memories of laughter, now they all fall
I reach for you, but you're not there
Leaving me with just this hollow air

[Chorus]
Tossed aside like a broken toy
Valued less than yesterday's joy
In your arms is where I used to be
But now you're gone and I'm lost at sea

[Verse 3]
The silence screams the words you wouldn't say
A final chapter turning on the page
I see the truth I chose not to believe
It's my own heart that I must now retrieve

[Altered Chorus]
No more your plaything, your broken toy
I'll find a worth beyond yesterday's joy
Your empty arms are just a memory
And I'm the one who will brave this sea

[Verse 1]
Whispers in the static, a hum beneath the skin  
Colors bleed like memories, I’m slipping in  
The architecture of the mind, a cathedral built to fall  
I scream for light but there’s no answer at all  

[Verse 2]  
I fight the system, wired in a dream that’s not my own  
A thousand hands reach out, but I’m not here to be known  
The signal’s strong, the pulse is loud, I’m dancing with the flame  
But every step I take just leads me back to the same  

[Chorus]  
Oh, the hum is sweet, it sings me to the end  
A lullaby of wires, where the broken hearts pretend  
I’m not afraid, I’m not alone—just lost in the sound  
The only truth I know is death is all around  

[Bridge]  
No exit in the circuit, no name, no face, no trace  
I am the echo in the system, I am the ghost in the space  
The system feeds on longing, the body fades to ash  
But the hum remains… and I’m still… still…  

[Outro]  
The hum… the hum… the hum…  
No fight, no fear, just the end…  
Just the hum…

nodes.title: Genre Tags
widgets_values: dubstep, trap, thick stutter percussion, piano chords, analog bass, rapid hi hats

[Verse 1]
I click the icon, the old login hums
Flickering sprites of a world undone
Empty plazas echo with my steps
Your silhouette waits where we once met
[Chorus]
Pixels bleed into digital dusk
A static heart in the purple husk
I whisper to ghosts that never speak
In this forgotten, fading creek
[Verse 2]
Memories flash like corrupted code
The day we conquered a glitching mode
Your avatar stands, eyes unblinking
Fading lines of love still linking
[Bridge]
A second you flicker, alive then gone
Broken fragments in the neon dawn
Don't let your light turn to ash
Hold on through this server crash
[Chorus]
Lush chords rise like a sunrise glow
Trap beats pulse as we let go
Singing without words, hearts collide
In bittersweet euphoria we ride
[Outro]
Disconnect drips in static silence
Purple sky darkens, the world defiles
I'll log back in when I can.

[Verse 1]
Dust falls on broken signs,
A hollow wind through rusted lines.
Empty eyes in shadowed lanes,
Whispering echoes of forgotten names.

[Chorus]
Beneath a sky of ash and grey,
Hope's a flicker fading away.
A silent scream, a broken plea,
Lost in the ruins, just you and me.

[Verse 2]
Concrete canyons, cold and deep,
Where shadows gather, secrets sleep.
A fragile life, a fading spark,
Lost in the darkness, a world apart.

[Bridge]
The weight of sorrow, a heavy chain,
A constant ache, a lingering pain.
No solace found, no guiding light,
Just endless darkness, and a starless night.

[Chorus]
Beneath a sky of ash and grey,
Hope's a flicker fading away.
A silent scream, a broken plea,
Lost in the ruins, just you and me.

[Outro]
Fading echoes, soft and low,
Where do we go, Where do we go,
In the ruins, we fade away
In the ruins, another day

[Verse 1]
Dust settles on the broken signs,
A hollow wind through tangled lines.
The empty eyes in shadowed lanes
Still whisper out forgotten names.

[Chorus]
Beneath a sky of ash and grey,
Hope is a flicker fading away.
A silent scream, a broken plea,
Lost in the ruins, just you and me.

The concrete canyons, cold and deep,
Where broken things and secrets sleep.
We are one fragile, fading spark
Alone together in the dark.

[Bridge]
The weight of silence is a chain,
A ghost of memory, a phantom pain.
There is no comfort, no guiding light,
Only the long and starless night.

[Chorus]
Beneath a sky of ash and grey,
Hope is a flicker fading away.
A silent scream, a broken plea,
Lost in the ruins, just you and me.

[Outro]
The echoes fade out soft and low...
Where do we go from here, where do we go?
In the ruins... another day.
In the ruins... we fade away.

[Verse 1]
Login beep, a cracked connection,
Empty plazas echo with static light.
I wander to the spot where you stood,
Your pixel frame frozen, fading bright.
[Chorus]
I feel the pulse in this glitching sky,
Memories rise in supersaw dreams.
Your laughter echoes through corrupted code,
In this silent world, it still redeems.
[Verse 2]
I whisper to your avatar, still,
"Remember the boss we fought in red?"
The skybox bleeds purple, a memory's spill,
Yet in the void, our hearts are wed.
[Bridge]
A flicker—your outline slips and fades,
Lines unglitch, the server shudders low.
Fear claws, I clutch the fading glow,
"Don't disappear," I beg in echo.
[Chorus]
In the drop, the chords swell like a tide,
A lush synth washes all the grief.
We dance with ghosts, no tear can hide,
Your presence lives in every riff.
[Outro]
Connection lost, the purple sky turns black,
I hear your name in the silence.
I will return, though the server cracks,
Forever chasing a digital track.

Synthwave
Song Prompt: "Digital Ghost"

Core Concept: A person revisits an abandoned, decaying online world (like a defunct MMO or social space) to "sit with" the static, unmoving avatar of a friend who has passed away, reliving memories in the silent, glitching landscape.

Character: The Protagonist, a person clinging to a digital memory. They are melancholic and nostalgic, speaking to the silent avatar as if it could hear them.

Setting: The "Elysian Fields," a once-beautiful online fantasy world, now a ghost server. Textures flicker, assets are missing, the skybox is a static purple. It's beautiful in its decay.

Structure & Scene Suggestions:

Intro/Verse 1: Logging In

Focus: The song begins with soft, arpeggiated synths and the sound of a dial-up modem or login screen. The protagonist describes the familiar but broken landscape, walking through empty plazas to a special spot where their friend's avatar stands, frozen in time.

Sonic/Lyrical Ideas: "Remember this place? The server's rust," "Your pixels are fading to digital dust," "I log in just to see your name," "A monument in a forgotten game." Pitched-up, ethereal vocal chops are introduced.

Buildup: The Memory Rush

Focus: As the protagonist "talks" to the avatar, the memories become more vivid. The music swells. Supersaw chords build, a drum roll (using claps and snaps) increases in speed and intensity, and the vocal chops get faster.

Imagery: "I can almost hear your voice in the static hiss," "the day we fought that glitched-out boss," "a screenshot of a digital kiss."

Chorus / Drop: Bittersweet Euphoria

Focus: The emotional peak. The drop hits with huge, lush, detuned supersaw chords that wash over everything. The bass is a clean, warm sub. The melody is beautiful but heartbreaking. The vocal chops are arranged into a new, wordless melody. This isn't a sad drop; it's a celebration of a memory so powerful it feels real again.

Sonic Ideas: The main sound is layered, pitch-bending synth chords. The drums are a half-time trap beat with a powerful snare/clap. The feeling should be overwhelming, like crying and smiling at the same time.

Bridge: The Glitch

Focus: The quiet aftermath of the drop. The music strips back to a simple piano or synth pad. The server becomes unstable. The friend's avatar flickers and glitches, threatening to disappear. A moment of panic and the stark reminder that this is just data.

Sonic/Lyrical Ideas: "For a second you were really there," "now you're just broken lines in the air," "Don't you disappear on me."

Outro: Server Shutdown

Focus: The song fades out as the protagonist is forcibly disconnected. The lush chords decay, the vocal chops stutter and die. The final sound is a "Connection Lost" error message and silence.

Imagery: "The purple sky just turned to black," "knowing that I'll always come back."

Musical Mood: Nostalgic, emotive, and lush Future Bass. Heavy use of layered supersaw synths, clean sub-bass, intricate vocal chops, and arpeggiated melodies. The dynamics should be extreme, moving from quiet introspection to overwhelming emotional drops.

Here is another example:

[Verse 1]
Night bleeds in through shattered screens,
A static ghost behind my eyes.
Your echo hums in the dial tone,
A phantom voice I can't disown.

[Instrumental]

[Chorus]
Send me a glass signal,
Break through the noise, make it visceral.
I’m tuned to the dark inside of you,
A low-wave solace, cutting through.

[Instrumental]

[Verse 2]
Screen-burn eyes and words unsaid,
Feel no ground beneath my tread.
Time unravels, bleeding code,
A lost transmission with no road.

[Bridge]
Caught between the pulse and fade,
Where every soft-lit memory frays.
Your voice, a glitch we couldn’t erase,
Still echoing in empty space.

[Instrumental]

[Chorus]
Send me a glass signal,
Refract the dark, go invisible.
You answer back in fractured tones,
A broken pulse to guide me home.

[Outro]
Don't need a map, just a single frame.
I know you're out there, transmitting the same.
Glass...
Signal...

[Verse 1]
Lost in neon dreams of yesterday,
Tracing patterns on a rain-streaked pane.
The city’s shadows twist and fade away,
Revealing something beautiful and strange.

[Chorus]
We're floating through this silver haze,
Lost inside these dream-lit, dying days.
Every breath, a poison in the air,
In this kaleidoscope despair.

[Verse 2]
A slow clock ticks a final countdown
Beneath the city’s burning crown.
I’m searching for a truth beyond
These walls of glass and plastic bone.

[Chorus]
We're floating through this silver haze,
Lost inside these dream-lit, dying days.
Every breath, a poison in the air,
In this kaleidoscope despair.

[Bridge]
Remember when we dared to dream?
Before the circuits blew a seam?
Now who can save us from this light
That burns so beautiful and bright?
We let reality dissolve like rain,
And now we're lost in here again.

[Guitar Solo / Instrumental]

[Chorus]
We're floating through this silver haze,
Lost inside these dream-lit, dying days.
Every breath, a poison in the air,
In this kaleidoscope despair.

[Outro]
Kaleidoscope...
Silver haze...
These dying days...
Fade away...

[Verse 1]
Ghost in my phone, your name's still there,
A fleeting ghost, without a care.
In hollow spaces, echoes remain,
From love that lost its shape.

[Chorus]
Lost in the haze of our broken past,
Tossed aside, like a moment not to last,
You left no mark, just an empty space,
Where we once shared a fragile place.

[Verse 2]
Fading light on a city's endless floor,
We stood as one, yet never more.
Synthetic love, in a digital haze,
A mirage that vanished with the days.

[Chorus]
Lost in the haze of our broken past,
Tossed aside, like a moment not to last,
You left no mark, just an empty space,
Where we once shared a fragile place.

trap, soft female vocals, vocal chops, synth swells, dark melody


====


[Verse 1]
Night bleeds in through shattered screens,
A static ghost behind my eyes.
Your echo hums in the dial tone,
A phantom voice I can't disown.

[Instrumental]

[Chorus]
Send me a glass signal,
Break through the noise, make it visceral.
I’m tuned to the dark inside of you,
A low-wave solace, cutting through.

[Instrumental]

[Verse 2]
Screen-burn eyes and words unsaid,
Feel no ground beneath my tread.
Time unravels, bleeding code,
A lost transmission with no road.

[Bridge]
Caught between the pulse and fade,
Where every soft-lit memory frays.
Your voice, a glitch we couldn’t erase,
Still echoing in empty space.

[Instrumental]

[Chorus]
Send me a glass signal,
Refract the dark, go invisible.
You answer back in fractured tones,
A broken pulse to guide me home.

[Outro]
Don't need a map, just a single frame.
I know you're out there, transmitting the same.
Glass...
Signal...

nodes.title: Lyrics
widgets_values:
[Verse 1] Piano chords and gospel hands,
traveling to distant lands.
The music is the only cure,
keeping the motivation pure.

[Pre-Chorus] Swell the pads and lift the voice,
making the universal choice.
To dance until the legs are weak,
climbing to the highest peak.

[Instrumental]

[Chorus] Wobble low, heavy blow.
The undertow is moving slow.
Pulling you beneath the wave,
deeper into the sonic cave.

[Instrumental]

[Verse 2] Funk guitar and slapping bass,
putting a smile on every face.
The groove is undeniable,
the energy reliable.

[Bridge] Hands are clapping on the beat,
moving in the summer heat.
The community is strong and tight,
burning through the middle night.

[Instrumental]

[Chorus] Snare snap, thunder clap.
Caught inside the honey trap.
Sharp and cutting, clean and bright,
slicing through the neon night.

[Outro] Silence is a loyal friend,
waiting at the very end.
But in the quiet, we can hear,
the rhythm ringing loud and clear.

nodes.title: Suggested APG YAML
widgets_values:
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# APG AUDIO DIFFUSION CONFIG - Granular Glide Path
# CORRECTED FOR APG GUIDER v1.4.2 (Chronological Order)
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

verbose: true # Show detailed rule matching in console

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# RULES
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# The code sorts rules by start_sigma (ascending).
# It picks the FIRST rule where: current_sigma <= start_sigma
# This file is written in chronological order (Phase 0 -> 6).
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

rules:
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  # PHASE 0: BOOTSTRAP - Max Noise (All σ > 0.9)
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  # (FIXED) Using start_sigma: -1 makes this the fallback rule
  # for all sigmas higher than 0.9 (i.e., the start of generation).
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  - start_sigma: -1            # Catches all sigmas > 0.9
    apg_scale: 0.0           # APG is OFF
    cfg: 12.0            # Strong CFG for initial direction
    predict_image: true

  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  # PHASE 1: EARLY STRUCTURE - Very High Noise (σ ≤ 0.9)
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  - start_sigma: 1.0
    apg_scale: 5.0         # Strongest APG application
    cfg: 10.0            # CFG begins its descent
    predict_image: true    # Guide the denoised output
    # --- (FIXED) 'mode: pure_apg' replaced with correct keys ---
    pre_cfg_mode: false
    update_mode: "DEFAULT"
    update_blend_mode: lerp    # Smooth momentum blending
    dims: [-1]             # Normalize over frequency dimension
    momentum: 0.6          # Positive momentum for stability
    norm_threshold: 2.5    # Prevent extreme corrections

  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  # PHASE 2: MAIN GUIDANCE - High Noise (σ ≤ 0.6)
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  - start_sigma: 0.6
    apg_scale: 4.0         # Tapering APG strength
    cfg: 8.0             # Tapering CFG strength
    # --- (FIXED) Settings must be explicitly defined in each rule ---
    predict_image: true
    pre_cfg_mode: false
    update_mode: "DEFAULT"
    update_blend_mode: lerp
    dims: [-1]
    momentum: 0.6
    norm_threshold: 2.5

  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  # PHASE 3: MID-RANGE REFINEMENT - Medium Noise (σ ≤ 0.4)
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  - start_sigma: 0.4
    apg_scale: 2.5         # APG is now half its initial strength
    cfg: 7.0             # CFG continues to soften
    # --- (FIXED) Settings must be explicitly defined in each rule ---
    predict_image: true
    pre_cfg_mode: false
    update_mode: "DEFAULT"
    update_blend_mode: lerp
    dims: [-1]
    momentum: 0.6
    norm_threshold: 2.5

  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  # PHASE 4: LATE DETAIL - Low-Medium Noise (σ ≤ 0.25)
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  - start_sigma: 0.25
    apg_scale: 1.5         # Gentle guidance for details
    cfg: 6.0             # Lower CFG
    # --- (FIXED) Settings must be explicitly defined in each rule ---
    predict_image: true
    pre_cfg_mode: false
    update_mode: "DEFAULT"
    update_blend_mode: lerp
    dims: [-1]
    momentum: 0.6
    norm_threshold: 2.5

  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  # PHASE 5: FINE-TUNING - Low Noise (σ ≤ 0.1)
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  - start_sigma: 0.1
    apg_scale: 0.75        # APG is barely active
    cfg: 5.0
    # --- (FIXED) Settings must be explicitly defined in each rule ---
    predict_image: true
    pre_cfg_mode: false
    update_mode: "DEFAULT"
    update_blend_mode: lerp
    dims: [-1]
    momentum: 0.6
    norm_threshold: 2.5

  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  # PHASE 6: FINAL POLISH - Very Low Noise (σ ≤ 0.05)
  # ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
  - start_sigma: 0.05
    apg_scale: 0.0         # APG is fully OFF
    cfg: 4.0             # Very low CFG for a clean, natural finish
    predict_image: true    # (Copied) Must be defined in every rule

dubstep, 80s Style Percussion, melodic

drumnbass, drum and bass, dubstep, trap, glitchy stuttering percussion, lonely piano chords, analog bass

disco house, nu-disco, melodic, energetic beats

nodes.title: Suggested Sampler YAML - Vocals
widgets_values:
# ------------------------------------------------------------------
# ACE-STEP AUDIO CONFIGURATION (v1.5.0)
# Compatible with: PingPongSamplerNodeFBG v1.5.0
# Tuned for: High-Dynamic Range Audio Generation
# ------------------------------------------------------------------

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- Main Sampler Settings ---
# Audio benefits from "block" randomization to maintain rhythmic consistency
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
step_random_mode: "block"  
step_size: 25
seed: 80085  # Base seed for reproducibility

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- Ancestral Settings ---
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
first_ancestral_step: 0
last_ancestral_step: -1
ancestral_noise_type: "gaussian"

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- Scheduling & Clamping ---
# Audio latents often exceed -1.0/1.0; clamping is usually disabled for audio
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
start_sigma_index: 0
end_sigma_index: -1
enable_clamp_output: false 

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- Blending ---
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
blend_mode: "lerp"
step_blend_mode: "cosine"  # Cosine helps smooth transitions between high-energy steps

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- Conditional Blending ---
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
conditional_blend_mode: false
conditional_blend_sigma_threshold: 0.3
conditional_blend_function_name: "lerp"
conditional_blend_on_change: false
conditional_blend_change_threshold: 0.2

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- Noise Control ---
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
clamp_noise_norm: false  # Keep FALSE for audio dynamic range
max_noise_norm: 1.5
adaptive_noise_scaling: false
noise_scale_factor: 1.0
progressive_blend_mode: false  # Audio structure is consistent; progressive blend might warp pitch

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- Res 2 Restarts (NEW in v1.5.0) ---
# Experimental for Audio: Can help fix "glitches" or phase issues.
# 
# RECOMMENDATION FOR AUDIO:
#   1. First render: enable_restarts=false (establish baseline)
#   2. If you hear artifacts: Try restart_mode="conservative"
#   3. For heavy correction: Use restart_mode="aggressive"
#
# AUDIO-SPECIFIC NOTES:
#   - Restarts may affect temporal coherence (rhythm drift)
#   - Works best for fixing glitches, not for creative effect
#   - Conservative mode is safest for music
#   - Aggressive mode better for sound effects/foley
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
enable_restarts: false  # Set to TRUE after baseline render
restart_mode: "conservative"  # Gentle mode for audio (switch to "aggressive" if needed)
restart_noise_scale: 0.35  # 35% jump-back (safe for audio temporal coherence)
restart_s_noise: 1.0  # Standard noise magnitude (NOT 0.10!)
restart_steps: ""  # Auto-generate (or specify: "20,40,60,80" for manual control)

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- Debugging ---
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
debug_mode: 2  # Detailed logging (0=off, 1=basic, 2=detailed)
enable_profiling: true
tensor_memory_optimization: false

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# --- FBG Config (Ace-Step Specifics) ---
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
sigma_range_preset: "Custom"  # Force manual ranges
fbg_sampler_mode: "PINGPONG"  # PINGPONG logic is REQUIRED for Ace-Step

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Static & Dynamic Guidance
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
cfg_scale: 6.0  # High base CFG is standard for Ace-Step
cfg_start_sigma: 1.0
cfg_end_sigma: 0.004
fbg_start_sigma: 1.0
fbg_end_sigma: 0.004

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Guidance Scaling & Limits (High Values for Audio)
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
max_guidance_scale: 5000.0  # Massive scale allowed for audio peaks
initial_guidance_scale: 3.0
fbg_guidance_multiplier: 550.0  # Aggressive FBG multiplier
guidance_max_change: 1000.0  # Allow rapid guidance shifts (transients)

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# FBG Core Parameters
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
pi: 0.35  # Lower PI = more aggressive guidance adaptation
t_0: 0.7  # Late offset
t_1: 0.4  # Early temp scaling
fbg_temp: 0.0
fbg_offset: 0.0

# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# State Management
# ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
max_posterior_scale: 3.0
log_posterior_initial_value: 0.0
log_posterior_ema_factor: 0.8  # High smoothing to prevent popping/clicking
